LanguageData.DMS_Chameleon_TD.label: Chameleon
LanguageData.DMS_Chameleon_TD.description: A four-legged heavy automatroid used for anti-tank ambushes. It is the main unit used by the Colonial Fleet to deal with armored regiments.
